meanings.definition: Created jointly by two or more people.
meanings.sent1: The cocreated project was a team effort.
meanings.sent2: The cocreated artwork showcased the talents of multiple artists.
meanings.sent3: The cocreated cake turned out to be a delicious mishmash of flavors.
meanings.sent4: Their cocreated garden bloomed with a blend of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The cocreated story was a beautiful collaboration of ideas.

meanings.definition: To create something together with others.
meanings.sent1: We cocreated a song that combined our different styles.
meanings.sent2: The team cocreated a plan to tackle the project together.
meanings.sent3: The friends cocreated a funny dance routine for the talent show.
meanings.sent4: Together, they cocreated a new recipe that became a family favorite.
meanings.sent5: The students cocreated a mural to decorate the school walls.
